string.text: We've acquired a cache of some high-quality weapons from our...business partners. Obviously we were planning on reselling them to our other contacts but in the time being we're in a bit of a pinch supply-wise. Help us with our supply issue and we'll spare you some of the lower end stock.
This place is definitely no resort. Lots of our guys have been able to salvage some 'lightly used' Monolith weaponry

Situation here is no joke. We've been able to find a lot of good material around here, but there's a lot of tough close quarters combat. If you have anything that works well for close encounters, we'd appreciate it a lot.
We ended up being able to ambush a squad of Monolith successfully. Got some good stuff.
